content.description: <math alttext="The figure shows a two row table with five columns of data. The heading for row 1 is “x.” The heading for row 2 is “f of x.” The data in the table are as follows. Column 1. x is 0. f of x is negative 8. Column 2. x is 2. f of x is negative 2. Column 3. x is 6. f of x is 0. Column 4. x is 12. f of x is 2. Column 5. x is 20. f of x is negative 18." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnlines="solid" columnspacing="0.0em" columnwidth="3em 0.05em 3em 3em 3em 3em 3em" equalrows="true" frame="solid" framespacing="0.0em 0.5ex" rowlines="solid" rowspacing="1ex" width="auto"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>12</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>20</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mtd><mtd><mspace depth="1.0ex" height="2.25ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mtd><mtd><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mtd><mtd><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>18</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is differentiable and has values as shown in the table above. Of the following, on which interval is the average rate of change of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> greatest?

choices.label: <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 2, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="open bracket, 2 comma 6, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="open bracket, 6 comma 12, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="open bracket, 12 comma 20, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 2, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
